achievements.title: Refined data processing and optimized system scalability at NREL
achievements.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance.

achievements.title: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions at Oracle
achievements.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in production environments for 2 international financial banking firms.

achievements.title: Enhanced UI for IA module and reduced execution times at Oracle
achievements.description: Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment (IA) module based on XML Forms Framework by customizing 4 UI Forms and 8 PL/SQL scripts to process over 300k customer records. Generated PL/SQL scripts to automate manual tasks, reducing execution times by 20% for generating end-user reports over 6 months.

achievements.title: Won AI assistant hackathon
achievements.description: Won the AWS for Startups prize for creating a multimodal AI assistant that automates browser tasks on behalf of users at the AICamp Generative AI Hackathon.

achievements.title: Modeled Rough Set Theory for Sensor Data Mining
achievements.description: Successfully modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python, designing a custom-built library to process 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with 95% accuracy using linear regression.
